DEPOSIT.subTitle: 980 Loopheads are up for grabs in the second Loophead dynamic NFT drop!
rules: Users who make a ETH, LRC, USDC, USDT, ENS, or UNI deposit onto Loopring L2 will have a chance to win a Loophead NFT. To be eligible, users must deposit a minimum of $100 USD during the specified dates while maintaining a positive net deposit on their L2 account by the end of the round.

Net deposits are calculated as inflows less outflows (withdrawals + transfers sent). There are three ways to make a deposit:
  • Ethereum L1 to Loopring Layer 2
  • Withdrawals from CEXs to Loopring via LayerSwap
  • FIAT to Loopring via Ramp or Banxa.

Winning addresses will be picked as follows:
  • March 3rd, 2022 (UTC 00:00) — April 1st (UTC 00:00)
  • 300 addresses with the highest net deposits during the eligible dates will receive a Loophead NFT.
  • 680 addresses will be selected at random to win a Loophead NFT by Lucky Draw. Addresses that deposit a minimum of $100 USD while maintaining a positive net deposit, will be entered into this draw.

Users will only be eligible for a Loophead NFT if they maintain a positive net deposit by the end of the round. Token values will be calculated based on the token price on coinmarketcap at the end of the round, measured in $USD.
Wallet addresses that have already won a Loophead NFT will be excluded.
